name: Queen City High School Game Jam 2016
name_original: Queen City High School Game Jam 2016
description:
On October 15th, 2016, six teams of high school students from Western New York (who had never made a game before) made games in 12 hours based on the theme "Social Good" for the Queen City High School Game Jam, powered by AT&T, and now you can download and play the games at home! Drive an ambulance, take out the trash, race supplies to Alaska, rescue hostages and more in these six student-made games.

Special thanks to AT&T, InfoTech WNY, WNY STEM and the Tri-Main Center for sponsoring this incredible event.
